name: original-music-hd-reloaded
title: Original Music HD - Reloaded
author: ruhroh & db48x, updated by Damgam, fishycat
description:
Enjoy four more tracks during gameplay. Where three of them are from earlier versions of Factorio - remastered by ruhroh. 

In addition to that, I added the main-menu track to the rotation of ambient sound.
